creator: Featherweight
descriptionHtml:
Open World

Botworld is a huge, beautiful and varied world which you can explore as you venture out to collect rare scrap and discover new bots. Enter new environments, meet a variety of characters, collect rare treasures and uncover the many secrets hidden in Botworld. You can explore freely the many lush forests and arid deserts but make sure you have a strong team of bots because you never know what's around the corner.

Battle

Outsmart your foes in a unique strategic battle system. Your bots will leap, charge stun or blast around the arena with advanced AI while you plan the perfect abilities to stomp your foes. Each bot has unique abilities and a powerful ultimate, combine these with the powerful player abilities for maximum effect.

Collect & Customize

You will discover build and collect rare and powerful bots to create the ultimate team. Search the world to discover new bot recipes and collect the rare scrap to build and upgrade your favourites. Customise their powers and abilities as the level up and get stronger.

Choose your Character

Play as one of 4 races: cats, dogs, buffalo and lizards. Choose a unique look to add your own personality to the character.
descriptionShort: Battle your way through an Epic Open World RPG from the makers of Rodeo Stampede

Botworld is a huge, beautiful and varied world which you can explore as you venture out to collect rare scrap and discover new bots. Enter new environments, meet a variety of characters, collect rare treasures and uncover the many secrets hidden in Botworld. You can explore freely the many lush forests and arid deserts but make sure you have a strong team of bots because you never know what's around the corner.

Battle

Outsmart your foes in a unique strategic battle system. Your bots will leap, charge stun or blast around the arena with advanced AI while you plan the perfect abilities to stomp your foes. Each bot has unique abilities and a powerful ultimate, combine these with the powerful player abilities for maximum effect.

Collect & Customize

You will discover build and collect rare and powerful bots to create the ultimate team. Search the world to discover new bot recipes and collect the rare scrap to build and upgrade your favourites. Customise their powers and abilities as the level up and get stronger.

Choose your Character

Play as one of 4 races: cats, dogs, buffalo and lizards. Choose a unique look to add your own personality to the character.
descriptionShort: Battle your way through an Epic Open World RPG from the makers of Rodeo Stampede

COLLECT & CUSTOMIZE

CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTER


Play as one of 4 species: cats, dogs, buffalo and lizards. Choose a unique look to add your own personality to the character.

Outsmart your foes in a unique strategic battle system. Your bots will leap, charge, stun or blast around the arena using advanced AI while you pick the perfect abilities to stomp your foes. Each bot has unique abilities and a powerful ultimate, combine these with your favourite player abilities for maximum effect.

COLLECT & CUSTOMIZE


You will discover, build and collect rare and powerful bots to create the ultimate team. Search the world to discover new bot recipes and collect rare scrap to build and upgrade your favourites. Customise their powers and abilities as they level up and get stronger.

CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTER


Play as one of 4 species: cats, dogs, buffalo and lizards. Choose a unique look to add your own personality to the character.

CREATE OR JOIN A GUILD!


Now Botmasters can come together and collaborate in completing quests! Join an existing guild or create your own, with the ability to share strategies and discoveries through the guild text chat. When you have enough botmasters in your crew, venture forth and take on the guild exclusive events! Finish these so you can score some unique scrap and outfits!
descriptionShort: Battle your way through an Epic Open World RPG from the makers of Rodeo Stampede

Outsmart your foes in a unique strategic battle system. Your bots will leap, charge, stun or blast around the arena using advanced AI while you pick the perfect abilities to stomp your foes. Each bot has unique abilities and a powerful ultimate, combine these with your favourite player abilities for maximum effect.

COLLECT & CUSTOMIZE


You will discover, build and collect rare and powerful bots to create the ultimate team. Search the world to discover new bot recipes and collect rare scrap to build and upgrade your favourites. Customise their powers and abilities as they level up and get stronger.

CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTER


Play as one of 4 species: cats, dogs, buffalo and lizards. Choose a unique look to add your own personality to the character.

CREATE OR JOIN A GUILD!


Now Botmasters can come together and collaborate in completing quests! Join an existing guild or create your own, with the ability to share strategies and discoveries through the guild text chat. When you have enough botmasters in your crew, venture forth and take on the guild exclusive events! Finish these so you can score some unique scrap and outfits!

descriptionHtml:

Botworld is a huge, beautiful and diverse world which you can explore as you venture out to collect rare scrap and discover new bots. Enter new environments, meet a variety of characters, collect rare treasures and uncover the many secrets hidden in Botworld. You can freely explore the many lush forests and arid deserts but make sure you have a strong team of bots because you never know what's around the corner!

BATTLE


Outsmart your foes in a unique strategic battle system. Your bots will leap, charge, stun or blast around the arena using advanced AI while you pick the perfect abilities to stomp your foes. Each bot has unique abilities and a powerful ultimate, combine these with your favourite player abilities for maximum effect.

COLLECT & CUSTOMIZE


You will discover, build and collect rare and powerful bots to create the ultimate team. Search the world to discover new bot recipes and collect rare scrap to build and upgrade your favourites. Customise their powers and abilities as they level up and get stronger.

CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTER


Play as one of 4 species: cats, dogs, buffalo and lizards. Choose a unique look to add your own personality to the character.

CREATE OR JOIN A GUILD!


Now Botmasters can come together and collaborate in completing quests! Join an existing guild or create your own, with the ability to share strategies and discoveries through the guild text chat. When you have enough botmasters in your crew, venture forth and take on the guild exclusive events! Finish these so you can score some unique scrap and outfits!
descriptionShort: Battle your way through an Epic Open World RPG from the makers of Rodeo Stampede

appDetails.developerAddress: 506/410 Elizabeth St, Surry Hills, NSW 2010, Australia
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

• Seasonal Leaderboards: Fight for placement in the Top 100 players every season in the new Arena and Raid leaderboards
• New Story Quest: Lead Ripjaw's Raiders into battle against the Sand Pirates of Parched Sea
• New Season Pass: The Season of Champions begins, providing access to a new Epic Bot Style, new cosmetics, and loads of scrap
• New Legendary Ability and Booster

title:
Botworld Adventure
1.18.0

container.value: 506/410 Elizabeth St, Surry Hills, NSW 2010, Australia

creator: Featherweight
descriptionHtml:
OPEN WORLD


Botworld is a huge, beautiful and diverse world which you can explore as you venture out to collect rare scrap and discover new bots. Enter new environments, meet a variety of characters, collect rare treasures and uncover the many secrets hidden in Botworld. You can freely explore the many lush forests and arid deserts but make sure you have a strong team of bots because you never know what's around the corner!

BATTLE


Outsmart your foes in a unique strategic battle system. Your bots will leap, charge, stun or blast around the arena using advanced AI while you pick the perfect abilities to stomp your foes. Each bot has unique abilities and a powerful ultimate, combine these with your favourite player abilities for maximum effect.

COLLECT & CUSTOMIZE


You will discover, build and collect rare and powerful bots to create the ultimate team. Search the world to discover new bot recipes and collect rare scrap to build and upgrade your favourites. Customise their powers and abilities as they level up and get stronger.

CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTER


Play as one of 4 species: cats, dogs, buffalo and lizards. Choose a unique look to add your own personality to the character.

CREATE OR JOIN A GUILD!


Now Botmasters can come together and collaborate in completing quests! Join an existing guild or create your own, with the ability to share strategies and discoveries through the guild text chat. When you have enough botmasters in your crew, venture forth and take on the guild exclusive events! Finish these so you can score some unique scrap and outfits!
descriptionShort: Battle your way through an Epic Open World RPG from the makers of Rodeo Stampede

appDetails.developerAddress: 506/410 Elizabeth St, Surry Hills, NSW 2010, Australia
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

• New Legendary Bot: Meteor is a Legendary tank who traps enemies in a deadly crater
• New Season Pass: The Season of Radiance begins, providing access to new cosmetics and loads of scrap
• 16 New Bot Styles
• New Legendary Booster

title:
Botworld Adventure
1.22.7

container.value: 506/410 Elizabeth St, Surry Hills, NSW 2010, Australia

creator: Featherweight
descriptionHtml:
OPEN WORLD


Botworld is a huge, beautiful and diverse world which you can explore as you venture out to collect rare scrap and discover new bots. Enter new environments, meet a variety of characters, collect rare treasures and uncover the many secrets hidden in Botworld. You can freely explore the many lush forests and arid deserts but make sure you have a strong team of bots because you never know what's around the corner!

BATTLE


Outsmart your foes in a unique strategic battle system. Your bots will leap, charge, stun or blast around the arena using advanced AI while you pick the perfect abilities to stomp your foes. Each bot has unique abilities and a powerful ultimate, combine these with your favourite player abilities for maximum effect.

COLLECT & CUSTOMIZE


You will discover, build and collect rare and powerful bots to create the ultimate team. Search the world to discover new bot recipes and collect rare scrap to build and upgrade your favourites. Customise their powers and abilities as they level up and get stronger.

CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTER


Play as one of 4 species: cats, dogs, buffalo and lizards. Choose a unique look to add your own personality to the character.

CREATE OR JOIN A GUILD!


Now Botmasters can come together and collaborate in completing quests! Join an existing guild or create your own, with the ability to share strategies and discoveries through the guild text chat. When you have enough botmasters in your crew, venture forth and take on the guild exclusive events! Finish these so you can score some unique scrap and outfits!
descriptionShort: Battle your way through an Epic Open World RPG from the makers of Rodeo Stampede
